devdoc.details: Shows how to access Ethereum blockchain global variables in Solidity

getMoreBlockInfo().details: Returns additional block information (updated for PoS)

returns.blockHashValue: The hash of one of the 256 most recent blocks
returns.coinbase: The current block miner's address (now validator in PoS)
returns.prevRandao: The randomness value from the Beacon Chain

devdoc.title: Global Variables Demonstration (Post-Paris Upgrade)

getMoreBlockInfo().notice: Shows updated global block variables after Paris upgrade

userdoc.notice: Updated for Ethereum's transition to Proof-of-Stake (Paris Upgrade)
